snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission also filed an administrative action against Deloitte of Shanghai for refusing to provide audit work papers related to the client.
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating another Chinese client of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu CPA Ltd of Shanghai on suspicion of accounting fraud; it also files an administrative action against Deloitte for refusing to provide audit work papers related to the unidentified client.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission also filed an administrative action against Deloitte of Shanghai for refusing to provide audit work papers related to the client.

headline.seo: S.E.C. Investigates Accounting of Deloitte Client in Shanghai
headline.main: S.E.C. Is Investigating Accounting of Chinese Client of Deloitte in Shanghai
headline.print_headline: S.E.C. Is Investigating Accounting of Chinese Client of Deloitte in Shanghai
